content.description:
Begin up the mono-colored grey slabby section, follow ledge to a corner and move up it, trending along a small left facing corner which ends at a nice bunch of flakes and runnels.

 From the anchor a 60m will get you down, but just barely
content.location: Right end of the tantrum wall. Look out for a slab below and right of a choss corner to a left facing corner

content.description: Long and interesting.  Slab to corner.
Thin start leads to some interesting runnel climbing.  Good rock!

Make bouldery moves off the deck pulling onto a balancy slab and continue up to a good rest at a horizontal beneath a bulge.  Pull over the bulge and move up the face above to another good rest beneath a stellar runnel system. Jam and stem up the runnels to a two bolt anchor.This climb is erroneously listed as "Baby Dick" in the 2021 Mojave Limestone guidebook.
content.location: Starts 5' left of Hissy Fit and is the third route to the left of the Tempered Tantrum corner.

content.description: This is the wall on the upper cliff that is left of the amphitheater.  This wall is tall with some really good rock (and some bad) with runnels up high.  There is potential remaining here.  Please respect any partially completed lines as closed projects.  They are probably Jon O'Brien's so check with him if you have interest in any incomplete lines not listed here.
